item.title: 斯洛伐克总统敦促内阁采取行动避免欧盟援助制裁
item.description: 斯洛伐克总统彼得-佩莱格里尼（Peter Pellegrini）敦促斯洛伐克政府采取必要的措施，避免可能受到欧盟的金融制裁。【原文：Slovak President Peter Pellegrini urged the government to take steps needed to avoid potential financial sanctions from the European Union.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计德国将掀起 IPO 浪潮和大型并购交易
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，由于投资者在经历了交易荒之后热衷于购买，未来两年德国可能会出现一波首次公开募股热潮。【原文：Germany could see a wave of initial public offerings in Germany over the next two years as investors are keen to buy after a drought of transactions, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 对石油交易商而言，供应过剩比需求更令人担忧
item.description:
在本周的新加坡会议上，全球对原油的需求似乎正在减弱，但迫在眉睫的新一轮原油生产浪潮引发了更大的担忧。【原文：

The world’s appetite for crude looks to be flagging, but a looming wave of new production poses a greater concern at this week’s Singapore conference.

】

item.title: 花旗称石油暴跌预示欧佩克+无需额外供应
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）表示，石油价格跌至两年多来的最低水平表明，市场认为没有必要增加欧佩克+的供应。【原文：Oil’s collapse to the lowest level in more than two years is the market’s indication that there’s no need for extra OPEC+ supplies, Citigroup Inc. said.】

item.title: 高盛将出售与 30 亿美元杠杆贷款相关的 SRT
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is selling a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of about $3 billion of leveraged loans, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其核电站在德国延误后寻求中国零件
item.description: 土耳其能源部长表示，由于德国西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）的运输延误可能导致项目脱轨，俄罗斯国有企业俄罗斯原子能公司（Rosatom Corp.【原文：Russia’s state-owned Rosatom Corp. has placed an alternative equipment order from China for Turkey’s first nuclear power plant, as shipping delays from Germany’s Siemens Energy AG threaten to derail the project, Turkish energy minister said.】

item.title: 交易商权衡巴西出口和天气因素，阿拉比卡咖啡下跌
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡从一个多星期以来的最高点回落，因为交易商权衡了巴西强劲的出口和对巴西干燥的担忧。【原文：Arabica coffee dipped from the highest in more than a week, as traders weighed strong exports from Brazil and concerns about dryness there.】

item.title: 欧洲面临科技难题：监管还是创新
item.description: 欧洲领导人要想在科技领域赶上世界其他国家，可能需要放弃他们屡试不爽的方法。但首先...【原文：Europe’s leaders may need to drop their tried-and-true methods if they are to catch up to the rest of the world in tech. But first...】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 2023 年 2 月以来最低点
item.description: 上周，美国抵押贷款利率降至 2023 年 2 月以来的最低水平，这为购房者壮了胆，刺激了再融资申请的增加，为房地产市场带来了可喜的消息。【原文：US mortgage rates slid last week to the lowest level since February 2023, emboldening homebuyers and spurring a pickup in refinancing applications in welcome news for the real estate market.】

item.title: 德国政府对联合信贷银行收购德国商业银行的举动感到错愕
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）采取的令人震惊的行动让德国政府措手不及，也让总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）陷入困境。【原文：UniCredit SpA’s shock move on Commerzbank AG caught Germany’s government off guard and puts Chancellor Olaf Scholz in a bind.】

item.title: 花旗称远离欧洲的中国风险股票
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：It’s too early to go bargain hunting for European stocks with high exposure to China, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists, putting them at odds with counterparts at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 在重要的美国通胀数据公布之前，国债反弹，交易员分析了总统辩论的后续影响，石油从2021年以来的最低点回升。以下是市场动态。【原文：Treasuries rallied ahead of important US inflation data, traders parse the presidential debate aftermath and oil recovers from the lowest since 2021. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: ICG 为欧洲直接借贷基金筹集到创纪录的 152 亿欧元资金
item.description: Intermediate Capital Group Plc 为欧洲直接借贷基金筹集了 152 亿欧元（约合 168 亿美元）的资金，这是该地区迄今为止完成的最大一笔融资。【原文：Intermediate Capital Group Plc has raised €15.2 billion ($16.8 billion) for a European direct-lending fund, the largest of its kind ever to close in the region.】

item.title: 债务影响投资，Transnet 再次违反贷款条款
item.description: Transnet SOC Ltd.连续第二年违反贷款契约，这家南非港口和铁路运营商在债务负担下苟延残喘，这限制了为重振濒临破产的设备和基础设施所需的投资。【原文：Transnet SOC Ltd. breached loan covenants for a second year running as the South African port and rail operator staggers under a debt burden that’s constraining investments needed to resurrect its ailing equipment and infrastructure.】

item.title: 欧洲央行 54,000 条头条新闻对利率前景的启示
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）最新发布的欧洲央行言论指数显示，理事会的鸽派态度在夏季达到顶峰，因此周四降息几乎是板上钉钉的事。但之后的情况就不那么明朗了。决策者情绪指数基于一种自然语言处理算法，该算法使用了彭博社自 2011 年以来关于欧洲央行发言人的 54,000 条新闻标题。欧洲央行【原文：The new ECBspeak Index from Bloomberg Economics suggests the Governing Council reached peak dovishness in the summer, making a rate cut on Thursday almost certain. What comes afterward is less clear. The index of policymaker sentiment — based on a natural language processing algorithm that used 54,000 Bloomberg news headlines on ECB speakers stretching back to 2011 — has moved sideways since June, with elevated wage growth and sticky services inflation limiting appetite for rapid easing. BE’s ba】

item.title: 据说澳新银行将重启出售雅加达上市银行 Panin 股份的计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）正在考虑重启出售印尼潘银行（PT Bank Pan Indonesia）股份的计划，因为这家澳大利亚贷款机构正在寻求精简业务。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. is considering reviving a sale of its stake in PT Bank Pan Indonesia, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as the Australian lender seeks to streamline its operations.】

item.title: 据称，Hillhouse 和 GIC 正在洽谈投资美的香港首次公开募股事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，另类资产管理公司Hillhouse Investment和新加坡主权财富基金GIC Pte正在考虑投资家电制造商美的集团股份有限公司在香港的上市。【原文：Alternative asset manager Hillhouse Investment and Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte are considering investing in appliance maker Midea Group Co.’s Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞银承诺为瑞士信贷提供 4000 亿美元贷款
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）瑞士区负责人萨宾-凯勒-布塞（Sabine Keller-Busse）表示，瑞银集团将继续向瑞士本土市场提供约 3500 亿瑞士法郎（约合 4140 亿美元）的信贷，以表明该行对瑞士的承诺。【原文：UBS Group AG will continue to provide about 350 billion Swiss francs ($414 billion) of credit to its home market as a sign of the bank’s commitment to Switzerland, country head Sabine Keller-Busse said.】

item.title: 津巴布韦最大矿商寻求 1.82 亿美元用于太阳能项目
item.description: 负责这些项目的可再生能源公司负责人表示，津巴布韦一些最大的矿商正在寻求 1.82 亿美元的资金，用于开发 200 兆瓦的本地太阳能发电项目。【原文：Some of Zimbabwe’s biggest miners are seeking $182 million to develop 200 megawatts of locally-generated solar power, according to the head of the renewables company responsible for the projects.】

item.title: 在新加坡上市的 Grand Venture Technology 希望在马来西亚第二次上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，为半导体制造商和其他行业生产元件的新加坡 Grand Venture Technology Ltd. 公司正计划在马来西亚第二次上市。【原文：Singapore-based Grand Venture Technology Ltd., which produces components for semiconductor makers and other industries, is targeting a second listing in Malaysia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 家居装饰连锁店 Mr DIY 印度尼西亚分部据称将于 2024 年底上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚家居用品零售商Mr DIY Group (M) Bhd.正在考虑最快于今年或2025年初在雅加达将其印尼分部上市。【原文：Malaysian home-improvement retailer Mr DIY Group (M) Bhd. is considering listing its Indonesian unit in Jakarta as soon as this year or early 2025, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 蜜蜂和巡逻队：乌干达农民如何防范咖啡盗窃
item.description: 为了防止咖啡作物再次被盗，乌干达农民查尔斯-瓦利戈（Charles Waliggo）一直在夜间醒来巡逻他的种植园。其他农民也被劝说用狗来看守种植园，甚至用蜜蜂。【原文：To stop his coffee crops being stolen yet again, Ugandan farmer Charles Waliggo has been waking during the night to patrol his plot. Others are being urged to turn to dogs to guard plantations — or even bees.】

item.title: 捷豹车主塔塔汽车因瑞银认为折扣风险而下跌
item.description: 塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd. ）的股价将创下 16 年来最长的连跌记录，因为瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，折扣上升将损害这家英国豪华 SUV 制造商的收益。【原文：Tata Motors Ltd.’s shares are set for their longest losing streak in 16 years as UBS Group AG said rising discounts would hurt the earnings of the British maker of luxury SUVs.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在欧盟旨在取消 700 亿欧元制裁的案件中败诉
item.description: 俄罗斯国家清算托收公司（National Settlement Depository）被指参与资助弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）总统入侵乌克兰，该公司在推翻欧盟对其制裁的申请中败诉。【原文：Russia’s National Settlement Depository lost a bid to overturn European Union sanctions over its alleged role in helping fund President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 莫迪表示，印度的目标是到 2030 年电子产业规模达到 5000 亿美元
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）大肆宣扬印度在技术领域的潜力，称印度的目标是到本十年末将电子产业的规模提高到 5000 亿美元。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi trumpeted India’s potential in technology, saying the country aims to increase its electronics sector to $500 billion by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德的 Data4 公司将为雅典新址投资 3 亿欧元
item.description: 在人工智能服务推动数据中心需求不断增长的背景下，由布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）支持的 Data4 公司将投资约 3 亿欧元（约合 3.31 亿美元）在希腊建设和开发一个新的数据中心。【原文：Brookfield-backed Data4 will invest around €300 million ($331 million) to build and develop a new hub in Greece amid increasing demand for data centers driven by artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: 如果石油市场困境持续，托克集团将改装更多超级油轮
item.description: 如果市场持续低迷，Trafigura 集团可能会将更多的原油油轮转为运输成品油。【原文：Trafigura Group could switch more of its crude-oil tankers to carry refined products if sluggish market conditions persist.】

item.title: 能多洁股价暴跌，佩尔茨因北美地区警告受挫
item.description: Rentokil Initial Plc 的股价在伦敦交易市场暴跌，市值损失超过 20 亿英镑（26 亿美元），原因是这家害虫防治公司下调了北美业务的增长预期。【原文：Rentokil Initial Plc shares plunged in London trading, erasing more than 2 billion pounds ($2.6 billion) in market value, after the pest-control company lowered growth expectations for its business in North America.】

item.title: 美国两年期收益率在 CPI 报告公布前跌至 2022 年以来最低点
item.description: 美国国债反弹，使两年期国债收益率升至 2022 年以来的最低水平，而在此之前，人们密切关注的通胀数据可能会巩固对货币宽松政策的押注。【原文：US Treasuries rallied, driving the two-year yield to the lowest level since 2022 ahead of a closely watched inflation reading that could cement bets on monetary easing.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在国内美元债券拍卖中筹集 9 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚政府在其首次国内美元债券拍卖中筹集了 9 亿美元，几乎是目标金额的两倍。【原文：Nigeria’s government raised $900 million in its first domestic auction of dollar-denominated bonds, almost double the targeted amount.】
